JSci.instruments
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  JSci.instruments.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Control, ImageSink
public class Player
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ImageSink

An object that creates an animated image from a ImageSource. Create a new Player, register it with a ImageSource; then you can add some ROIs. It displays a window with the image and a window with all the controls of the chain.

See Also:
Serialized Form
